/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the urban landscape. The street, filled with cars and buses, stretches out into the distance, creating a sense of depth and scale. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the sides of the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it, adding to the overall brightness of the scene. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and the expanse of the sky. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the blue of the sky contrasting with the various hues of the buildings and the greenery in the background. The perspective of the image gives a comprehensive view of the cityscape, capturing the essence of urban life in Beijing.
